snippet.title: Johnny Depp Hit Rock Bottom During Amber Heard Divorce
snippet.description:
In a recent interview with Rolling Stone magazine, Johnny Depp recalls how emotionally broken he was after his divorce to ex-wife Amber Heard.

Heard filed for divorce, in 2016 from Depp after 15 months of marriage. During that time Depp’s mother, Betty Sue, died from cancer.

Depp recalls pouring himself a glass of vodka every morning and writing until tears began to fill his eyes. “I was as low as I believe I could have gotten…I couldn’t take the pain every day.” said Depp. He regularly wrote a memoir to help ease the pain. Depp stated, “I kept trying to figure out what I’d done to deserve this. I’d tried being kind to everyone, helping everyone, being truthful to everyone. The truth is most important to me and all this still happened.”

Heard and Depp met while filming the 2011 movie ‘The Rum Diaries.’ After their separation, Heard was awarded $7 million in the divorce settlement, which she donated to charity.…
